member.param: Miladi date time or Utc date time

member.name: M:AuxiliaryLibraries.AuxiliaryCalendar.ToPrettyDayOfWeek(System.DateTime,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert datetime to day of the week as pretty format. Samples: Persian format is like = امروز ، دیروز ، فردا ، شنبه ، جمعه ، ... Miladi format is like = Today , Yesterday , Tomorrow , Saturday , Friday, ...
member.param: Miladi date time or Utc date time
If Date is utc send it True, the default valur is False
If you want to convert to persian date send it true, and for miladi date send false. Default value is true
If you chose persian date, it may need to return 1 شنبه, instead of یکشنبه. So set it true

member.param: Miladi date time or Utc date time
If you want to convert to persian date send it true, and for miladi date send false. Default value is true
If you chose persian date, it may need to return 1 شنبه, instead of یکشنبه. So set it true
